original_text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.
korean_text: 내가 스데바나와 브드나도와 아가이고가 온 것을 기뻐하노니 그들이 너희의 부족한 것을 채웠음이라

sentences.original_text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus:
sentences.korean_translation: 스데바나와 포르투나두스와 아가이고의 온 것을 내가 기뻐하노라:

sentences.original_text: for that which was lacking on your part
